edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database

Class MessageUsersDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database.MessageUsersDB

  • public class MessageUsersDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides methods to retrieve, delete messages submitted to all FLIP users
    Author:
    Patricio Galdames
